name: searchinventory
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fortnitecosmetics.
Tool description: A data base of fortnite cosmetices
API description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
available inventory in the system

skip.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return. Defaults to 0, which means no limit.

searchstring.description: An optional search string to look up inventory items. Defaults to 'string'.
